ComicInfo.Summary:
A fake is only the beginning...
James Bond is forced into a world he doesn’t understand.
Counterfeits, smuggling, following impossible trails to invisible villains. Can he learn to trust others for help, or will the mission leave him behind? From VITA AYALA (Morbius), DANNY LORE (Queen of Bad Dreams), ERIC GAPSTUR (The Flash: Year Zero), and ROBERT CAREY.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Jim Cheung (a) & Romulo Fajardo Jr. (c) | 1 | B/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Jim Cheung | 2 | C/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Pure Pencil Sketch" Edition Variant Cover | Jim Cheung | 3 | D/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Vintage Paperback Homage" Edition Variant Cover | Jim Cheung (a) & Romulo Fajardo Jr. (c) | 4 | E/LE | Limited Edition "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Jim Cheung (a) & Romulo Fajardo Jr. (c) | 5 | F/FOC | 1:11 FOC Bonus Incentive "Tinted" Edition Variant Cover | Jim Cheung | 6 | G/FOC | 1:15 FOC Bonus Incentive "Virgin Tinted" Edition Variant Cover | Jim Cheung | 7 |
